name: Blastoise
author: NC Empire
flavor_text: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

abilities.name: Vitality Spring
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 6 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.
